Detailed Description

This class is used to store chromosome DNA sequences.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Chromosomes::Chromosomes ( char *  map_dir,
char *  map_name 
)

Class constructor.

Parameters:
map_dir the directory where the chromosome map file is located
map_name the name of the chromosome map file
Chromosome sequences are loaded on the fly from the *.dna files. For efficient sequence extraction, genomic intervals must be grouped by chromosome. If not, use the alternative constructor described below.

Example of map file (stored in map_name):

1 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.1.fa.dna
10 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.10.fa.dna
11 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.11.fa.dna
12 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.12.fa.dna
13 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.13.fa.dna
14 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.14.fa.dna
15 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.15.fa.dna
16 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.16.fa.dna
17 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.17.fa.dna
18 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.18.fa.dna
19 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.19.fa.dna
2 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.2.fa.dna
3 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.3.fa.dna
4 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.4.fa.dna
5 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.5.fa.dna
6 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.6.fa.dna
7 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.7.fa.dna
8 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.8.fa.dna
9 <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.9.fa.dna
MT <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.MT.fa.dna
X <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.X.fa.dna
Y <TAB> Mus_musculus.NCBIM37.52.dna.chromosome.Y.fa.dna

Each *.dna file contains the chromosome sequence in one line.

Chromosomes::Chromosomes ( char *  fasta_file,
bool  verbose 
)

Class constructor.

Parameters:
fasta_file FASTA file containing chromosome sequences
verbose if 'true', print messages while loading chromosome sequences
Chromosome sequences are loaded in memory from the FASTA file. Example FASTA file:

>chromosome_1
TAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTA
>chromosome_2
CGTATCCCACACACCACACCCACACACCACACCCACACACACCCACACCC
>chromosome_3
TCCTCCCAGAATCTGGAGAGGTCAACCTGTTCTTCAAAGCAGTGGTGGAT
>chromosome_4
ACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTAACCCTACCCTAACCCTAACC
